Adventure.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Adventure.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Adventure.title: Black Panther
Adventure.description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

Adventure.title: Dune: Prophecy
Adventure.description: Two Harkonnen sisters combat forces that threaten the future of humankind and establish the fabled sect that will become known as the Bene Gesserit.

Adventure.title: Free Guy
Adventure.description: When Guy, a bank teller, learns that he is a non-player character in a bloodthirsty, open-world video game, he goes on to become the hero of the story and takes the responsibility of saving the world.

Adventure.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Adventure.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Adventure.title: Shazam!
Adventure.description: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

Adventure.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
Adventure.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

Drama.title: F1
Drama.description: Follows a Formula One driver who comes out of retirement to mentor and team with a younger driver.

Drama.title: Fight Club
Drama.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

Drama.title: Moonlight
Drama.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

Drama.title: The Assassin
Drama.description: A female assassin receives a dangerous mission to kill a political leader in eighth-century China.

Kids.title: How To Train Your Dragon
Kids.description: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he unexpectedly becomes a friend of a young dragon.

Kids.title: Lilo & Stitch
Kids.description: Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.

Kids.title: Moana 2
Kids.description: After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana must journey to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she's ever faced.

Action.title: Jamie Bond
Action.description: The 2025 blockbuster 'Jamie Bond' stars Margot Robbie in a thrilling new take on the iconic British spy franchise, reimagining the classic character as a female lead. Directed by a visionary filmmaker who blends traditional espionage with a modern twist, this film sets itself apart within the Bond series.

Action.title: Blade Runner 2049
Action.description: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

Action.title: Borderlands
Action.description: An infamous bounty hunter returns to her childhood home, the chaotic planet Pandora, and forms an unlikely alliance with a team of misfits to find the missing daughter of the most powerful man in the universe.

Action.title: The Matrix
Action.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Action.title: Tenet
Action.description: Armed with only the word Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, CIA operative, The Protagonist, journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a global mission that unfolds beyond real time.

Action.title: Top Gun: Maverick
Action.description: The story involves Maverick confronting his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.

Action.title: Wonder Woman
Action.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

Comedia.title: Back in Action
Comedia.description: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.

Comedia.title: Bullet Train
Comedia.description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.
